title: How did everyone go with ranked TT?
body:
i for one with my mates how the best afternoon/night in a long time playing how we used to with 3s ranked :D

I actually found games faster than i would with normal 5s! the ques were on fire :D

Hope this becomes a perma game!!!! please riot <3

replies.body: 7-0 currently hoping for that plat 1 placement

I played two solo games as Jungle Zac late last night, and went 4/0/6 in both of them.  I'm a big fan of TT, so it's fun being able to play ranked finally. Looking forward to finishing my provisionals! Both of my games took around 2 minutes to get into.
ahhh nice nice :) hope to see you in TT next time :)
Didn't find a game for 5 mins so friend talked me out of it saying it was a dead mode. feelsbadman looking at all these posts.
ahh :( i had games every second :(

> [{quoted}](name=Bytez,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=jUjLdhEy,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-12-09T01:03:41.234+0000)
>
> Didn't find a game for 5 mins so friend talked me out of it saying it was a dead mode. feelsbadman looking at all these posts.

In most servers it is pretty damn dead so I kinda have to agree with your friend. Once the hype goes down of it being back I'm expecting it to take even longer. I will still play it though because I love the gamemode.

I have to apologise to everyone D:

2 of our friends that hardly ever play, came online, so the 3 of us played with them instead, so we didn't get to do our part of the 3v3 marathon.

Please forgive! next week I will have to just not even sleep!
ahaha xD see you in the TT ;)
Yeah mate it was great as expected

I played 2 games, which was all I had time for. I didn't do too well, but that's just me (or maybe it was partly because it's a new ranked queue, so all the high ELO players would be "starting" at a low silver MMR?). Anyway, I enjoyed TT more than I enjoy SR. Will definitely be playing as much as I can next Thursday (which probably wont be much, again).

More than likely the TT ranked matchmaking will be pretty trash tier for a little while, because even if they base it off your normal TT mmr, there isn't much data to go on, especially for those who haven't played much TT (or none at all) until now.

So it's not just you dw :P
Nah the elo stayed same as what ever rank you where for solo/duo and flex

I have never played TT before, but both me and my friend decided to try it out last night. Its now my favourite gamemode. I actually think its better than normal Summoners Rift. Will definitely be playing it whenever its available.

Oh and btw we went 2-2 in our first four promos. Our first two games we had no idea what we were doing but then we picked it up and started dominating!
